about_the_game:
Unlock the following skins by purchasing the Bright Memory: Infinite Youthful Days DLC

*Turning on Perspective-assist will allow you to view custom skins during certain scenes.


  • Youthful Days: Shelia (Character costume)
  • Assault Rifle: Flesh Pink (Weapon skin)
  • Shotgun: Flesh Pink (Weapon skin)
  • Handgun: Flesh Pink (Weapon skin)
  • Sniper Rifle: Flesh Pink (Weapon skin)
  • Hybrid Sword: Heaven & Earth (Weapon skin)
  • Smartphone wallpaper (Saved in game installation folder)
